trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc    Register a new user
 * @route   POST /api/users
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.username - The user's username
 * @param {string} req.body.email - The user's email address
 * @param {string} req.body.password - The user's password
 * @returns {object} 201 - An object containing the user's data and a JWT token
 * @returns {Error}  400 - User with this email or username already exists
 * @returns {Error}  400 - Invalid user data
 * @returns {Error}  500 - Email could not be sent
Check if a user with the given email or username already exists

leadingComments.value: Check if a user with the given email or username already exists

extra.rawValue: User with this email or username already exists
extra.raw: "User with this email or username already exists"

arguments.value: User with this email or username already exists

trailingComments.value: If the user is created successfully, send verification email

value.raw: Please verify your email by clicking on this link: <a href="
value.cooked: Please verify your email by clicking on this link: <a href="

extra.rawValue: Verification email sent to your email address
extra.raw: 'Verification email sent to your email address'

value.value: Verification email sent to your email address

leadingComments.value: If the user is created successfully, send verification email

*
 * @desc    Register a new user
 * @route   POST /api/users
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.username - The user's username
 * @param {string} req.body.email - The user's email address

trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc    Auth user & get token
 * @route   POST /api/users/login
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.login - The user's email or username
 * @param {string} req.body.password - The user's password
 * @returns {object} 200 - An object containing the user's data and a JWT token
 * @returns {Error}  401 - Invalid password
 * @returns {Error}  401 - User not found
 * @returns {Error}  401 - Please verify your email first
Find the user by email or username

leadingComments.value: Find the user by email or username

trailingComments.value: If the user exists and the password matches, return the user's data and a token

leadingComments.value: If the user exists and the password matches, return the user's data and a token

*
 * @desc    Auth user & get token
 * @route   POST /api/users/login
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.login - The user's email or username
 * @param {string} req.body.password - The user's password
 * @returns {object} 200 - An object containing the user's data and a JWT token
 * @returns {Error}  401 - Invalid password
 * @returns {Error}  401 - User not found
 * @returns {Error}  401 - Please verify your email first

trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc    Verify user email
 * @route   GET /api/users/verifyemail/:token
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.params.token - The email verification token
 * @returns {object} 200 - Email verified successfully
 * @returns {Error}  400 - Invalid or expired token

leadingComments.value:
*
 * @desc    Verify user email

 * @returns {object} 200 - Email verified successfully

trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc    Forgot password
 * @route   POST /api/users/forgotpassword
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.email - The user's email address
 * @returns {object} 200 - Token sent to email
 * @returns {Error}  404 - User not found with that email
 * @returns {Error}  500 - Email could not be sent

extra.rawValue: User not found with that email

arguments.value: User not found with that email

value.raw: You are receiving this email because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of a password. Please make a PUT request to: <a href="
value.cooked: You are receiving this email because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of a password. Please make a PUT request to: <a href="

value.raw: . If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
value.cooked: . If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc    Reset password
 * @route   PUT /api/users/resetpassword/:token
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.params.token - The password reset token
 * @param {string} req.body.password - The new password
 * @returns {object} 200 - Password reset successfully
 * @returns {Error}  400 - Invalid or expired token

comments.value:
*
 * @desc    Register a new user
 * @route   POST /api/users
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.username - The user's username
 * @param {string} req.body.email - The user's email address
 * @param {string} req.body.password - The user's password
 * @returns {object} 201 - An object containing the user's data and a JWT token
 * @returns {Error}  400 - User with this email or username already exists
 * @returns {Error}  400 - Invalid user data
 * @returns {Error}  500 - Email could not be sent
Check if a user with the given email or username already exists
If the user is created successfully, send verification email

*
 * @desc    Auth user & get token
 * @route   POST /api/users/login
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.login - The user's email or username
 * @param {string} req.body.password - The user's password
 * @returns {object} 200 - An object containing the user's data and a JWT token
 * @returns {Error}  401 - Invalid password
 * @returns {Error}  401 - User not found
 * @returns {Error}  401 - Please verify your email first
Find the user by email or username
If the user exists and the password matches, return the user's data and a token

*
 * @desc    Verify user email
 * @route   GET /api/users/verifyemail/:token
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.params.token - The email verification token
 * @returns {object} 200 - Email verified successfully
 * @returns {Error}  400 - Invalid or expired token

*
 * @desc    Forgot password
 * @route   POST /api/users/forgotpassword
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.body.email - The user's email address
 * @returns {object} 200 - Token sent to email
 * @returns {Error}  404 - User not found with that email
 * @returns {Error}  500 - Email could not be sent

*
 * @desc    Reset password
 * @route   PUT /api/users/resetpassword/:token
 * @access  Public
 * @param {object} req - Express request object
 * @param {object} res - Express response object
 * @param {string} req.params.token - The password reset token
 * @param {string} req.body.password - The new password
 * @returns {object} 200 - Password reset successfully
 * @returns {Error}  400 - Invalid or expired token

. If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
